text: Mba tugen Zisas phorga rui gumgi, mbe ana han zav kha nzambaren ana muuŋgi, “The Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mbe ana piin kɨrga tugar zɨ bakɨme kɨrie?” 18.1 Khe mbe meeŋthɨgi buni mpeeiŋ rɨgar ki fethɨgi buna mpeeŋ ma. Zisas mba buna mpeeŋ suaŋgi, ne Matiu khergi gavar ki. Mba kameŋ 18.3-35. Mba buni nta guigira Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi warir muunga tɨvi ma.
